subject: Football
Free Agents (Sports)
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: Chase Beeler was an all-American center in 2010, but went undrafted — and when training camp finally starts, the time he might have spent meeting coaches and learning plays will be lost.
snippet: Chase Beeler was an all-American center in 2010, but went undrafted — and when training camp finally starts, the time he might have spent meeting coaches and learning plays will be lost.
